entry.title: AllisonOge/electromagnetism-and-antenna-theory-v2-1
entry.summary:
A book on transmission line and the wave equations for undergrad courses at the university of benin

Electromagnetism and antenna theory v2

A book for undergrads at the department of electrical and electronic engineering, University of Benin for the course code EEE 473. The book is written in latex and the setup guide is treated here

entry.title: huxuan/resumecls
entry.summary:
A LaTeX document class to typeset a resume or cv both in English and Chinese with more ease and flexibility.

resumecls

A LaTeX document class to typeset a resume or cv both in English and Chinese with more ease and flexibility.

Online Preview & Edit (with Overleaf Template)

An overleaf template is available here for preview.

You can also edit it directly on the overleaf.

Installation (for Offline Usage)

Since resumecls is included in the CTAN. You can install it by any package managers.

Take tlgmr as example,

tlmgr install resumecls

Usage / Examples

please refer to resumecls-example.

Offline Compile

To get the document class file and document manually, you can compile via Makefile or LaTeX commands.

Makefile

Get resumecls.cls

make cls

Get resumecls.pdf

make doc

Clean intermediate generated files

make clean

Clean for distribution

make distclean

LaTeX

Get resumecls.cls

latex resumecls.ins

Get resumecls.pdf

xelatex resumecls.dtx
makeindex -s gind.ist -o resumecls.ind resumecls.idx
makeindex -s gglo.ist -o resumecls.gls resumecls.glo
xelatex resumecls.dtx
xelatex resumecls.dtx
